DESCRIPTION: Recombine with a spawned Slime, healing 3 HP.
Lose 3 HP and spawn a Slime minion, who attacks at the start of each turn.  Absorb your oldest one if you have no room, healing 3 HP.
The next attack deals increased damage, consuming the Slimed effect, and healing you for half the amount consumed. Half of Slimed is removed at end of turn.
Increases the damage of ALL of your Spawned Slimes.
Attacks for 9 each turn, and gains 1 damage when you play a Power.
Attacks for 6 each turn, then increases it's damage by 2.
Attacks for 2 and grants you 2 Block each turn.
Attacks for 1 and applies 2 Poison each turn.
Attacks for 1 and applies 2 Slimed each turn.
Increases Block each turn. Reduced when you take damage.
Attacks for 6  and grants you 6 Block each turn.
0-cost cards that apply a variety of debuffs.
Does not attack and is unaffected by Potency. Provides 1 Strength, 1 Dexterity, and 2 Potency.
Replace with a random new card of your class, regardless of type. It costs 1 less.
Receives 10% more damage per card played in a turn.
High-damage Attacks that also deal a small amount of damage to you.
Powerful 0-cost cards, inspired by the bosses of the Spire.
